name: Arctozolt
description: The shaking of its freezing upper half is what generates its electricity. It has a hard time walking around.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.effect: Whenever an electric-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it.  This ability will not take effect if this Pokémon is ground-type and thus immune to Electric moves.  Electric moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.  This effect includes non-damaging moves, i.e. thunder wave.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being paralyzed.  Pokémon that are immune to electric-type moves can still be paralyzed by this ability.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, there is a 50% chance that encounters will be with an electric Pokémon, if applicable.

abilities.name: Slush Rush
abilities.effect: During Hail, this Pokémon has double Speed.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.
